post.body: Yep, I'm the creator of [EtherShuffle](https://ethershuffle.com) a new decentralized game where 80% of the time you win 100% of the time! Check it out at https://ethershuffle.com

Game 1 Complete! Check it out at https://ethershuffle.com. Distributions have automatically been sent out to the winners. Verify everything on the [blockchain](https://etherscan.io/tx/0xfb0127df8e33f1034ee52e7bb9615e0c600fd370f78a95276cc84533730cb3b3)!

#gambling #ethereum #cryptocurrency #bitcoin #blockchain #ethershuffle
I just added the dap to ZeroNet at //1NLSgiCKcJWa3k5XpDbFEUhG86mhniVpzb/
Now you can check out ZeroNet on the clearnet or ZeroNet /1NLSgiCKcJWa3k5XpDbFEUhG86mhniVpzb/

comment.body: @Piloth: If you use MetaMask (and your own private node) you can even keep your identity concealed (MetaMask uses Infura as an external ethereum node)
If you want, you can try out the Ropsten test net first before you run on main at https://ropsten.ethershuffle.com...I haven't pushed the ropsten site to ZeroNet
@Piloth: You're using Ropsten? It keeps the players unique, that other player is in your two games
I'll add a few players, watch the games
The main net works in much the same way...it's pretty cool, it's pretty new and only 2 games have completed there but there have been 8 winners and only 2 losers so far.
